div.head: 橫生
div.div: birth [of a child] in a transverse position

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: birth [of a child] in a transverse position

sense.def: Alternative Names heng chan 橫 產 , delivery [of a child] in a transverse position. Pathological Condition of nan chan 難產 , difficult birth, of a baby from a breech presentation, with the child entering the birth canal with the buttocks or feet first. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry wu gou xue 烏狗血：主產難橫生，血上搶心者 , “It controls difficult birth and birth [of a child] in a transverse position , as well as rising blood knocking at the heart”.
